coffees.description: Traditional espresso coffee with creamy foam

coffees.description: Half and half of traditional espresso with steamed milk

coffees.description: Espresso coffee mixed with a little hot milk and foam

coffees.title: Hot Chocolate
coffees.description: Drink made with chocolate dissolved in hot milk and coffee

coffees.description: Iced espresso drink with rum, heavy cream, and mint

coffees.title: Hawaiian

coffees.title: Irish
